name: 彼得·巴尼法兹
name_full: 彼得·巴尼法兹 Peter Banifaz
introduction: Peter Banifaz is an Iranian actor and comedian out of Los Angeles. He was born, Payam Banifazl in Tehran, Iran and immigrated to the US with his family at the age of 8. Some of his credits include a recurring role on Shameless as well as roles on Veep, Silicon Valley, Brooklyn Nine-Nine as well as many other. He has an MBA from California Lutheran University.
